++ Anstruth Bard College
Bard College of [Tajuru]

Lead by Virtuoso Viarmo

College Focus: Strummed Melody

Instruments can be purchased at the College's shop
    -Lute - 35g
    -Lyre - 30g
    -Viol - 2g
    -Harp - 45g
    
Graduates are given a Anstruth Harp, Instrument of The Bards - pg 176
    -must train 62 days at the college and become proficient with 3 (new) instruments
    -skipped days will +2 to the total days of training needed
    -if training days is 70 or more, the student must retake all classes and repay the tuition
    -pay 300g tuition
